5  * MD5 Message-Digest Algorithm (RFC 1321).

28 #ifndef LLVM_SUPPORT_MD5_H
29 #define LLVM_SUPPORT_MD5_H
30 
31 #include "llvm/ADT/ArrayRef.h"
32 #include "llvm/ADT/SmallString.h"
33 #include "llvm/Support/DataTypes.h"
34 
35 namespace llvm {
36 
37 class MD5 {
38  // Any 32-bit or wider unsigned integer data type will do.
39  typedef uint32_t MD5_u32plus;
40 
41  MD5_u32plus a, b, c, d;
42  MD5_u32plus hi, lo;
43  uint8_t buffer[64];
44  MD5_u32plus block[16];
45 
46 public:
47  typedef uint8_t MD5Result[16];
48 
49  MD5();
50 
51  /// \brief Updates the hash for the byte stream provided.
52  void update(ArrayRef<uint8_t> Data);
53 
54  /// \brief Updates the hash for the StringRef provided.
55  void update(StringRef Str);
56 
57  /// \brief Finishes off the hash and puts the result in result.
58  void final(MD5Result &Result);
59 
60  /// \brief Translates the bytes in \p Res to a hex string that is
61  /// deposited into \p Str. The result will be of length 32.
62  static void stringifyResult(MD5Result &Result, SmallString<32> &Str);
63 
64 private:
65  const uint8_t *body(ArrayRef<uint8_t> Data);
66 };
67 
68 }
69 
70 #endif
